posts.java: public class Solution {public String convertToBase7(int num) {if (num < 0) return '-' + convertToBase7(-num); if (num < 7) return Integer.toString(num); return convertToBase7(num / 7) + num % 7; } }

posts.cpp: class Solution {--newline--public:--newline--        string convertToBase7(int n) {--newline--          return n>=0? n>=7? convertToBase7(n/7)+to_string(n%7) : to_string(n) : '-'+convertToBase7(-n);--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--};
